NAME: Living Flask Of Water
EFFECT1: Gain one point for each water card on the field.
EFFECT2: Add one rank 2 water card from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Complecting Elements
EFFECT1: This turn, increase the rank of one water card you control by one.
EFFECT2: While this card is on the field, water cards can rank up using fire cards.

NAME: Glistening Sea Orb
EFFECT1: Draw one card, then discard one card of your choice.
EFFECT2: Add up to two rank 2 water cards from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Flame From The River
EFFECT1: Discard one water card to add one fire card from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: Until your next turn, all water cards you currently control become rank 2 fire cards.

NAME: Shimmering Orb Of The River
EFFECT1: Lose one point to untap one water card you control.
EFFECT2: Add up to two rank 1 water cards from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Majestic Spring Water
EFFECT1: Untap exactly two units on the field.
EFFECT2: You can rank up one of your water card using a unit from your discard pile.

NAME: Living Orb Of Water
EFFECT1: Add up to three rank 2 water cards from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: While this card is under another, all water cards you control gain 400 attack.

NAME: Inflammable Fluids
EFFECT1: Add up to three rank 4 fire cards from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: While this card is on the field, all water cards can be ranked up using fire cards.

NAME: Inferno
EFFECT1: Destroy this card to destroy up to three rank 3 spell cards on the field.
EFFECT2: Discard two water cards to destroy all units your opponent controls.

NAME: Peace By Fire
EFFECT1: Destroy this card to destroy up to three rank 1 cards on the field.
EFFECT2: For each card destroyed this turn, add one spell from your deck to your hand at the end of the turn.

NAME: Spell Malfunction
EFFECT1: Destroy this card to destroy up to two rank 2 spell cards on the field.
EFFECT2: Counter the effect of a spell card.

NAME: Whirling Of Flame And Fluid
EFFECT1: Destroy one fire card you own to play one water card from your discard pile.
EFFECT2: Discard one fire or water card to counter the effect of one card on the field.

NAME: Quantum Crystal Spark
EFFECT1: Draw one card.
EFFECT2: Draw two cards, then discard three cards of your choice.

NAME: Volcanic Sword Of Zerr
EFFECT1: The equip card gains 200 attack.
EFFECT2: Destroy this card to destroy up to two rank 1 spell cards on the field.

NAME: Fibonocci's Flame
EFFECT1: Destroy up to two rank 3 creature cards on the field.
EFFECT2: Destroy exactly two rank 1 spell cards on the field.

NAME: Luminous Fire Beta
EFFECT1: Add one rank 2 aquatic card from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: This card can rank up using a water card.

NAME: Baby Fire Tethyr
EFFECT1: Until your next turn, all aquatic cards you control become rank 2.
EFFECT2: You can rank up this card using a water card.

NAME: Baby Fley Draconia
EFFECT1: Add up to two rank 1 spells from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: Discard this card to add one rank 4 dragon card from your deck to your hand.

NAME: Ember Foxling
EFFECT1: Add up to two rank 2 or lower beast cards from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: Return one beast card from the field to the owner's hand.

NAME: Fireback Salamander
EFFECT1: Copy the effect of one Reptile card in your discard pile.
EFFECT2: This turn, all Reptile cards gain 200 attack.

NAME: Fizzifurro
EFFECT1: Add one beast card from your deck to your hand.
EFFECT2: Discard one beast card to play one beast card from your discard pile.

NAME: Flame Knight, Leander
EFFECT1: Add one rank 4 or lower warrior card from your discard pile to your hand.
EFFECT2: While this card is on the field, all warrior cards gain 50 attack.
